name: Spacetronaut (Alcarnarmo)
description:
This is the assignment for the Coursera Specialisation on Unity 2020. This is what I changed from the original assets:

  • Revamped (almost) the entire UI
  • Created four levels, including a chaser level
  • Reskinned some enemies, added new behaviours
  • Reskinned the buttons
  • Added a player behaviour
  • Added falling platforms
  • Created a chasing fireball (animated)
  • Created a new pickup object
  • Added new sounds and music
  • Added a backstory

Credits: Created by Rodolphe Blet © 2022
